name: Winter Night (itch)
description:
Rumor has it.. the forest near your home has been cursed by snowmen and on a full moon, they rise...

You go to that same forest to get some wood for the cold, cold winter night... not knowing your fate.

How long can you survive in the snowman chaos?

Survive against hordes of snowmen in the dark forest winter night..

Can you beat my high score of 57500? You can try.

CREDITS

3D Models, programming: me

SFX: me

Music: vivaldi - winter uploaded by neosounds

CONTROLS:

WASD And SPACE to jump/move

left click to attack.

ESC to pause.
